name: Cora Protocol
introduce: Cora is a decentralized lending platform that allow users to borrow stablecoins for a fixed period of time and only pay a one-time borrowing fee without the risk of being liquidated. Borrowers can use any supported token as collateral, including ERC-20s and ERC-4626s. Liquidity Providers can provide any supported stablecoin as liquidity to the protocol and earn Borrowing Fees for doing so.
